other_title: Asobi ni Ikuyo! OVA, Let's Go Play! OVA
plot: Eris is now on a mission to learn about Earth games and how they are played... There's just one thing, Eris seems to think that bets have to be placed every time, and while some bets are material items, eventually the Catians learn the idea of betting clothing items... This could get real interesting for Kio.
ending_theme: "Smile☆Peace (スマイル☆ピース)" by Kanae Ito, Haruka Tomatsu and Kana Hanazawa
